Author: rail
Name: AetherPool
Punchline: A 2D pool game inside Final Fantasy XIV.
Description: Play a game of pool directly in a Dalamud window. Use /pool to open.
Changelog:
v0.4.0.0: Advanced triggers and major UI/visual enhancements. 
 - Added 'Open on X' triggers for death, queue, etc.
 - Added a new title screen with background and outlined text.
 - Added a player assignment indicator to the HUD.
 - Added 'Victory'/'Game Over' text at the end of a match.
 - Replaced the cue ball with a new custom texture.
